body: @Osmose I figured out why the built XPI wasn't working. In Firefox we use `jar.mn` to specify how files are made available as `resource://` files. For the XPI we need to use `chrome.manifest` for that. I've added that file to the add-on, and that made it work for me in Firefox Unbranded 52.
